resources.string: A simplified 720 degree panorama browsing software
Are you sure you want to delete
Are you sure you want to clear
Delete files at the same time
Sorry, there is something wrong with the program
Sorry, your device does not support the most basic OpenGL ES 2.0, the program cannot continue rendering
The panorama you are going to browse does not look like a normal scale panorama image. If you continue browsing, it may cause image deformation and other problems. Do you want to continue loading?
The image is not a normal scale panorama
The panorama image may not be loaded normally. Is it possible for you to continue browsing?
Panoramic video is not normal scale
You\'ve reached the end of list
Press again to exit the program
Do you want to clear the list?
The images in the current list and categories will be cleared, but the source files will not be deleted.
The images of the selected favorites will be cleared, but the source files will not be deleted.
Remove from home page and other albums at the same time (source files will not be deleted)
Screenshot success! Image saved to album
Select the app to open this file
Sorry, your system can\'t open this image
Sorry, we don\'t support opening this image right now
There is no panorama or panorama video
Do you really want to delete this image?
Do you want to delete the selected panorama?
Do you want to delete the selected favorites?
You can delete %d selected panoramas from this list, or delete the source file together. After deleting the source file, it cannot be undo.
You can delete %d selected panoramas from this favorites. This operation will not delete the source file
Please select some files you want to delete
Please select a file you want to open
The panorama has been collected to my favorite
The panorama has been removed from my favorite
Are you sure clear the program cache?
The program cache has been cleared!
Gyro rotation is not supported in this mode
There is no panorama here. Click "+" below to import some panoramas!

This program needs to obtain the permission to read local files to open panorama for you, and save the necessary cache and settings. If you do not grant the necessary permissions to the program, the software may not work normally.

You may have manually denied the permission to use "read file or store" to this program just now or before. The system will not ask you whether to allow it again. You need to allow the permission manually.
If you need to continue to use this app, please open the necessary permissions. 
If you don't open the permission, the application will not be able to read your panorama. This application will become a completely useless thing. It is recommended to uninstall it immediately. 
Please allow this program to "Access photos media, and files" in "Application Settings > permissions" to allow this program to read local files.
After importing data, the current data will be overwritten and unrecoverable. Do you want to continue?
Instead of covering the current data, merge it with the new data (if the data is duplicate, it will not be imported)
This image format is not supported at this time
The image is too large (over 65536x32768), we can\'t open this file
The image is too large to decode. Please convert it to JPG format and open it again
The image cannot be opened. The image may be corrupted or the format is not supported
Decoding failed. The video may be damaged or the format is not supported
The video does not contain images and cannot be played
This video format is not supported

When browsing a large panorama (larger than 4096x2048), it will not be compressed, will be displayed in the highest definition of the file. Although it can have a better effect, it may increase the burden of hardware.
Do not check the scale of the panorama

If the scale of the panorama is not the normal 720 degree panorama, the rendering may appear image deformation after the software is opened, so the software will give a prompt to ask whether you want to continue loading. You can disable this prompt by turning on this option
Go to the AppStore and check updates
Keep the screen on in panorama page
Restore setup data from a file backup
When the panorama browsing cache is enabled, the reading speed of a very large panorama can be accelerated
Reducing FPS can reduce battery power consumption by reducing rendering times (0 to 25 frames per second), but the picture may get stuck

If enabled, the program can catch the error exception information when an error occurs, and send it back to the server (excluding your personal information) at the next startup, so as to help us better improve the software (it is recommended to turn on)

Welcome to 720 panorama viewer! 
We attach great importance to your privacy and personal information protection. 
 before you use 720 panorama viewer, please read the user agreement and privacy policy carefully. You need accept all the terms before you start using 720 panorama viewer. 
In addition, in order to better use the product functions, we need to ask your permission to request the following permissions:
In order to better use the product features, the app also asks for your permission to obtain the following permissions:

It includes device ID / screen size / operating system / device model / network connection mode / mobile country code / screen resolution and system language; it is used to provide different functions and experiences according to different devices and system versions, obtain product usage and bug information, and help us improve product and experiences.

Including the IP address; we need to download the calculation data online; and help us to count the product usage, feed back the product bug, and help us continuously improve the product function and experience.
We need to temporarily write program data, program computation cache, and so on.
If you do not agree or refuse to grant these permissions, you will not be able to use app.
